Radish Boy: Oh, Grandpa Potato! What are you doing out so late?
Potato Elder: I should be the one saying that young 'un!
Anyway, I'm in the middle of my workout.
I work out by burrowing through them..
..and burrowing out from the other side.
It helps to keep me hidden from dangerous bugs too.
*cough* *cough* Why don't you give it a try?
[Press E to burrow in and out.]
